    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActionInput
    Represents an action-based input during a player's turn, This input is captured as a single character corresponding to the chosen action.
    ActionSelection
    Represents a player-selected action that can be executed during a turn.
    BadInput
    Custom exception used to indicate invalid or malformed input by the player.
    Bot
    Interface representing a bot (automated player) in the Parade game.
    Card
    Represents a single card in the game, characterized by its color, value, and visibility (face-up or face-down).
    CardCollection
    Represents a general interface for any collection of cards in the game, such as a hand, board, or deck.
    CardColors
     
    CardInput
    Represents a card selection made by a player during their turn.
    CardNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a specified card cannot be found in a collection, such as a player's hand or the parade board.
    CardSelection
    Represents a player-selected card action to be executed during a turn.
    Deck
    Represents a deck of 66 face-up cards used in the game.
    DisplayFactory
    DisplayFactory handles all low-level formatting and UI presentation logic.
    FinalRoundTurnState
     
    Game
    Main class for the Parade game.
    GameContext
    Holds all core data relevant to a single game session.
    GameEndState
    Final game state that executes after all players have finished their final turns.
    GamePlayState
    Abstract superclass for game states that involve actual gameplay.
    GameRulesDisplay
    GameRulesDisplay is responsible for constructing the formatted string that contains all the game instructions for Parade.
    GameState
     
    GameStateManager
    Manages the flow and transitions between different game states.
    GameTurnState
    Abstract class for handling turn-based gameplay logic during normal and final rounds.
    InitState
    Represents the initialization phase of the game.
    InputHandler
    Abstract class representing an input handler for managing player input during the game.
    InputManager
    Manages user input mode switching and delegates input to the appropriate handler.
    InvalidCardException
    Thrown when a player attempts to play a card that does not meet the game's conditions.
    LineInputHandler
    Handles line-based input from the terminal using JLine.
    MenuException
     
    MenuInputHandler
    Handles menu-based input using arrow key navigation and ENTER key selection.
    NotFinalRoundTurnState
    Represents the main game loop during the non-final rounds of the game.
    ParadeBoard
    Represents the Parade Board in the game, which holds a row of cards and provides methods for displaying and manipulating them.
    Player
    Represents a player in the Parade game.
    PlayerBoard
     
    PlayerHand
    Represents a player's hand in the Parade game.
    RandomBot
    A simple bot that chooses moves randomly from its available cards.
    SelectionException
    Exception thrown when an invalid or unsupported selection is made during a player's turn.
    SelectionInput
    A sealed interface representing a player's selection input during their turn.
    SmartBot
    A smarter bot that chooses the card with the least number of kicks (removed cards) based on a simulation of the parade rules.
    SmarterBot
    A more advanced bot that not only minimizes the number of kicked cards, but also considers the total score of those cards to make better decisions.
    TurnSelection
    A sealed interface representing a selectable turn action in the Parade game.
    UIManager
    UIManager acts as a controller for user interface-related operations, delegating rendering tasks to DisplayFactory while managing flow and formatting.
